title: Subpart 363-4 - Permit Application Requirements
content:
Subpart 363-4 - Permit Application Requirements

State Regulations
§ 363-4.1 - Landfill permit application requirements

§ 363-4.4 - Hydrogeologic investigation report
§ 363-4.5 - Construction quality assurance (CQA) and construction quality control (CQC) plan

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
